  2. Spanish Gen Z singles ditch dating apps for supermarket sweep  Euronews
  3. Spanish supermarket shoppers using pineapples to search for love in surprising new craze  Sky News
  4. Amor in the frozen aisle! Spanish singletons ditch dating apps to look for love during 'flirting hour' at the  Daily Mail
